data.comment: Loved the humor and the emotional moments. The character arcs were beautifully wrapped up!
Visually stunning and fun, but I felt the villain could have been more impactful.
James Gunn delivered another masterpiece! Loved the soundtrack and the character development.
Best Guardians movie yet! Emotional, action-packed, and hilarious. Rocketâ€™s story was heart-wrenching.
It was entertaining, but the pacing felt a bit slow in the middle. Still a solid Marvel movie.
